Sean Sperte

Hot Dogs

While deciding on a place to eat lunch, The Wife suggested (in all seriousness) a hot dog vendor located in the middle of Redmond Town Center.

“Absolutely not,” I replied. “The only time I eat hot dogs is during a sporting event.”

“You could run around RTC,” she said.

Rolling my eyes, I replied, “no, I mean, a sporting event in which I am a spectator.”

“I could run around it and you could watch.”

We decided on something else.
